page.title: 12LITTLE BARFORD POWER STATION
page.content:
The power station after many years in use has now been closed down. The following is the text of an interview with a Mr. Oddy who worked at the station for six years, before it closed, as a craft attendant.
Qu.What did you do exactly? An.I helped maintain the electrical machinery. Qu.How many people worked there before the power station closed? An.Three hundred. Qu.Were you sad to see the power station close? An.Yes because I had to leave the friends I had made over the years. Qu.Was there anything interesting or exciting that happened to you whilst you worked at the power station? An.Every day was;I had different jobs.
